climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: FIRST OF ITS KIND: Tru Earth's ultra-concentrated fabric softener is the industry's first laundry softener sheet designed for your washing machine, not your dryer. This liquid alternative can be used with any standard or HE washing machines in both hot and cold water settings.

THE MOST CONVENIENT METHOD: Tru Earth Fabric Softener Eco-Strips end the need for heavy plastic jugs and messy liquid fabric softener. No measuring, no spills or splashes, these life hacks save space and eliminate hassle; great dorm room gift idea.

SAFER TO USE: Our gentle formula is paraben-free, phosphate-free, cruelty-free, environmentally friendly, septic and gray water safe and works with all washing machines and temperature settings and our strips fully dissolve each time.

NO WRINKLES, NO WASTE: Our powerful, patent-pending formula delivers a natural, soft feel to your laundry while effectively reducing wrinkles. Plus, we pack our fully-dissolving strips in recyclable packaging to ensure a plastic jug-free and planet-friendly laundry experience.

EASY AND EFFORTLESS: We’ve made doing laundry easy. Simply add a Tru Earth softener strip along with your laundry into the drum of your washing machine. 1 strip = 1 load. For larger loads, use 2 strips. For smaller loads, use a half strip. These one-size-fits-all strips work in all washing machines.
body.description: Tru Earth Fabric Softener - Fresh Linen Alternative to Liquid Fabric Softener Tru Earth's ultra-concentrated fabric softener is the industry's first laundry softener sheet designed for your washing machine, not your dryer. This liquid alternative can be used with any standard or HE washing machines in both hot and cold water settings. Our gentle formula is paraben-free, phosphate-free, cruelty-free, friendly to the environment, septic and gray water safe and works with all washing machines and temperature settings and our strips fully dissolve each time.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Tru Earth Fabric Softener - Fresh Linen Alternative to Liquid Fabric Softener Tru Earth's ultra-concentrated fabric softener is the industry's first laundry softener sheet designed for your washing machine, not your dryer. This liquid alternative can be used with any standard or HE washing machines in both hot and cold water settings. Our gentle formula is paraben-free, phosphate-free, cruelty-free, friendly to the environment, septic and gray water safe and works with all washing machines and temperature settings and our strips fully dissolve each time. Paraben-free Phosphate-free Plastic Jug-Free Scent Booster

Powerful Patent-Pending Formula Our patent-pending formula provides a naturally soft feel to all your clothes, delicates, bed sheets, curtains and other fabrics while also significantly reducing wrinkles. Just add a single strip into your washing machine with your laundry detergent when you are ready to start the wash cycle, close the door, and start up the machine. No fuss, no mess. Friendly to the Planet and Plastic Jug-Free Tru Earth Fabric Softener Eco-Strips are the next step in our ongoing initiative to help reduce plastic waste while helping you enjoy a cleaner and happier home. Our innovative softener strips are chlorine bleach-free, paraben-free, and phosphate-free. They come in plastic-free recyclable cardboard packaging. Plus, they are cruelty-free and septic and grey water safe. Convenient Size Each Tru Earth Fabric Softener Eco-Strip is 2 x 3.8 in (5.1 x 9.7 cm) making them so easy to store - they take up very little shelf space! No liquid fabric softeners in bulky plastic jugs means no measuring, no spills, drips or splashes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great travel product
reviews.reviewText: These actually work very well. Very easy to travel with taking up minimal space. Easy to use. Clothes turn out softer and noticeably less wrinkled. Smells good but subtle and not over powering. No clean up. Overall great product! Will probably switch to using this at home regularly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful softener strips
reviews.reviewText: These are fantastic! They take little storage space and they work great in my HE washing machine….just put one stip in with detergent pods….makes clothes smell fresh….wonderful product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Less waste to dispose of
reviews.reviewText: I love the smell and the quality of this fabric softener sheet. Added bonus less waste to throw away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and it works well. I like the way it cleans
reviews.reviewText: I liked the ease of use. Not sure if they work as well as a liquid softener. But will try them again,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The description said it would do its thing and disappear. I didn't believe it, so I had to try it. I was pleasantly surprised when I didn't smell any scent, when my clothes didn't climg together and--yes--when there was nothing left. I put one square of Earth Fabric Softener in the dryer with my clothes and it was gone when I took my clothes out, Very nice,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very good fabric softener
reviews.reviewText: I am delighted to have found fabric softener sheets in my ever ongoing battle against single use plastics in my home. My clothes smelled very fresh, we're very soft and wrinkle free. The 1 issue I have that will keep me back in the search is it did nothing to aid removal of hair from my clothes. Everything black I had to go over repeatedly with a glue roller brush to get the hair off of them. 🙄

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great green product
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these with the intention to give them a test and returned them. However, after looking at the package material, the space saved on my laundry shelf, and results after using them for a few weeks, I can say this item is a keeper.The sheets are soft and easy to use. I use 1/2 a sheet for a regular load of laundry and a full sheet for workout laundry (shirts, sweaters, sweatpants, soccer gear, ... . ). To add, it is a green product (no more big plastic jug). To add, the sheets work on all color loads of laundry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No plastic waste
reviews.reviewText: Sheets dissolve well in wash, easy to use, save space in storage, easy to travel, Save the Environment!

reviews.reviewTitle: I was surprised by this fabric softener.
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised by this natural fabric softener. It does soften my clothes and the scent is very pleasing. I was a bit concerned that it would not work well, but it does what it says it does. I also like the fact that the packaging is recyclable.
We travel quite a bit & always include a packet in our luggage. Very convenient & lightweight. Washes well & have even started using it at home.
These are great for packing in a suitcase when travelling, or an RV. They take up very little space. The quality of the product is excellent. No complaints

Was very practical to have these strips with us on vacation. We stayed in several Airbnbs in Europe and didn’t have to deal with carrying liquid onto the plane. They’re also easy to pack and light weight. Not great for removing stains but good enough to use for a trip.
Works great small package less plastic waste!!!
